content:
Spotting Bo Talos up ahead, you are about to call out to him to tell him the good news when you are suddenly pulled away by none other than his estranged friend, Olyv Sol. She leads you around the corner of a nearby building and starts pacing back and forth, sweat beading on her forehead. "I can't do it," she says. "I can't go through with it."

You tell Olyv it's going to be okay, and that you will be nearby, cheering her on. She shakes her head. "You don't understand. He was so mad last time. When I…when I left. What if we just end up arguing again?"

You remind her that Bo was the one who sent for her. Clearly, he's not angry any more. He wants to make peace. "I know, I know," she nods along. Can you just…go talk to him first? Let him know that I'm here?"

Search the collection for Olyv, Ranger Aspirant and put her into play. (Do not read her entry. She'll either be in the Lone Tree Station set or the Valley set.) If OLYV EARNED HER CLOAK, add 4 XP to her.

Clear Bo with   to encourage the two of them to speak with one another.
